description: A world where computer programming and anime collide!

rooms.name: Main Menu
rooms.description: You find yourself in a vibrant hub, surrounded by portals leading to different programming languages and anime universes.

rooms.name: Python Dojo
rooms.description: You enter a serene dojo where Python masters hone their skills. The walls are adorned with code snippets and anime posters.

items.name: Python Scroll
items.description: A mysterious scroll containing ancient Python wisdom.

items.name: Python
items.description: A snake that comes with cool poison powers

characters.name: Sensei
characters.description: A wise old master who knows the secrets of Python.
characters.dialogue: Welcome, young programmer. Are you ready to learn the ways of Python?

rooms.name: JavaScript Academy
rooms.description: You step into a high-tech academy buzzing with JavaScript enthusiasm. Interactive displays and holographic projections fill the room.

items.name: JavaScript Wand
items.description: A magical wand that can cast JavaScript spells.

characters.name: Professor
characters.description: An eccentric professor who loves JavaScript more than anything.
characters.dialogue: Ah, a new student! Welcome to the wonderful world of JavaScript!

rooms.name: Java Temple
rooms.description: You approach an ancient temple dedicated to Java. The air is filled with the hum of code compilation.

items.name: Java Tome
items.description: An ancient tome filled with Java knowledge and secrets.

characters.name: Oracle
characters.description: A mysterious oracle who can foresee the future of Java.
characters.dialogue: Welcome, seeker of Java knowledge. What brings you to this sacred temple?

rooms.name: C++ Arena
rooms.description: You enter a grand arena where C++ warriors compete in coding battles. The atmosphere is electric with the clash of intellects.

items.name: C++ Sword
items.description: A sharp sword forged with the power of C++.

characters.name: Champion
characters.description: The reigning champion of the C++ Arena, undefeated in coding battles.
characters.dialogue: Another challenger approaches! Let's see if you have what it takes to code in C++!

rooms.name: Anime Forest
rooms.description: You venture into a enchanted forest straight out of an anime. Colorful creatures and magical elements surround you.

items.name: Anime Crystal
items.description: A shimmering crystal that contains the essence of anime powers.

characters.name: Code Fairy
characters.description: A mischievous fairy who loves to play with code and cause bugs.
characters.dialogue: Hehe, welcome to the Anime Forest! Ready for some coding adventures?

rooms.name: Anime City
rooms.description: You find yourself in a vibrant city filled with anime characters and high-tech gadgets. The streets are buzzing with energy.

items.name: Anime Gadget
items.description: A futuristic gadget with incredible anime-inspired abilities.

characters.name: Anime Hacker
characters.description: A skilled hacker who can infiltrate any system with their anime-themed code.
characters.dialogue: Welcome to Anime City, where code and anime merge into one! Need any hacking help?

rooms.name: Anime Mountains
rooms.description: You stand before a majestic range of mountains, reminiscent of iconic anime landscapes. The peaks seem to touch the sky.

items.name: Anime Artifact
items.description: An ancient artifact imbued with the power of legendary anime heroes.

characters.name: Anime Sage
characters.description: A wise sage who has mastered the art of combining anime and programming.
characters.dialogue: Ah, a traveler seeking knowledge. What programming wisdom do you seek in these anime mountains?

rooms.name: Anime Island
rooms.description: You arrive on a tropical island filled with anime-inspired creatures and mysterious ruins. The island radiates a strange energy.

items.name: Anime Relic
items.description: A powerful relic that grants the ability to summon anime characters into the real world.

characters.name: Anime Explorer
characters.description: An adventurous explorer who has discovered the secrets of Anime Island.
characters.dialogue: Welcome to Anime Island! Ready to explore the mysteries and find anime treasures?
